objects.text:
• 7-Quart capacity, feeds 9+ people
• Digital timer up to 20 hours
• Travel-proof locking lid
• Dishwasher-safe parts

product_details.description: Whether you’re feeding friends and family at home, or taking your meal on the go or to an event, the Crockpot 7 QT Cook & Carry Programmable Slow Cooker makes sharing a home-cooked meal with loved ones easy and effortless. The Cook & Carry travel-proof locking lid provides a tight seal to prevent leaks and spills, for no mess on the go, and convenient handles make it easy to carry and take your favorite slow cooked meals anywhere. A digital countdown control allows you to easily program your slow cooker from 30 minutes up to 20 hours. When cooking is completed, temperature automatically shifts to warm mode to avoid overcooking. The digital display also lets you track your meal progress and monitor remaining cook time. With a 7-quart capacity, it cooks meals for 9+ people, perfect for feeding a crowd. When you’re finished slow cooking, both the lid and the stoneware can be placed in the dishwasher for easy cleanup.

banner_details:
The banner design features a modern, diagonally split background with a pastel and deep contrast aesthetic. The top-left section includes a light peach (#F8B195) fill, while the bottom-right section uses a deep slate blue (#355C7D). Decorative semi-transparent geometric elements (lines and circles) accent the layout with a playful touch. The primary headline (`heading`), subheadline (`subheading`), and price (`price`) are prominently set in large, bold white text, creating strong visual hierarchy. A product feature list (`description`) is placed below the subhead in soft peach for a subtle yet informative callout. The central product image (`product_image`) is positioned flat and centered. A brightly colored call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`) in coral orange (#FF7F50) invites interaction. The composition balances visual clarity and commercial appeal.

**Color Palette**:  
- Peach: #F8B195  
- Slate Blue: #355C7D  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Coral Orange: #FF7F50
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern Crockpot with a minimalistic, professional color palette. Dominated by a cool, matte charcoal gray body (#6E6E6E), the product uses soft gradients to provide depth and soft contrast. The lid and accent parts incorporate a subtle metallic silver-gray (#D3D3D3), while the control panel features a creamy off-white background (#F1F1F1) that highlights the text and buttons. The text and interface buttons use muted taupe (#A9A8A8) and darker gray (#4A4A4A) to maintain slick readability. This palette blends cool neutrals with subtle warmth, perfect for banner backgrounds, lifestyle imagery, or call-to-action highlights in advertisements.
